text: Jimmy Kimmel ’ s Mean Tweets segment returned Thursday night, just in time for Game 1 of the NBA Finals. After fans watched the Golden State Warriors thrash the Cleveland Cavaliers on ABC, basketball stars past and present read out toxic Twitter messages directed at them on the same network ’ s late - night show. James Harden, Magic Johnson, Shaquille O ’ Neal, Karl Malone, DeAndre Jordan, Mike Conley Jr., Paul George, Doc Rivers, Walt Frazier and ESPN ’ s Michelle Beadle all joined in what has become “ Jimmy Kimmel Live ’ s ” most popular skits.
